FROM del_outbound o LEFT JOIN del_outbound_address a ON a.order_no = o.order_no where o.order_no=#{orderNo}
SELECT shipment_rule as shipmentRule,shipment_days as shipmentDays,track_stay_days as trackStayDays from del_query_settings where shipment_rule=#{shipmentRule} LIMIT 0,1
select order_no,tracking_no,warehouse_code from del_outbound where order_no=#{orderNo} AND del_flag='0' LIMIT 0,1

SELECT exception_message_wms, state, order_no, seller_code, custom_code, order_type FROM del_outbound WHERE state in ('DELIVERED','PROCESSING') AND exception_message_wms IS NOT NULL AND exception_message_wms != '' AND order_type IN('Normal','SelfPick','Batch','NewSku','SplitSku','Destroy') AND create_time <= #{createTime} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT a.order_type, a.order_no, a.custom_code, a.shipment_rule as prc_interface_product_code, a.create_time, b.country FROM del_outbound a LEFT JOIN del_outbound_address b on b.order_no=a.order_no WHERE state in ('DELIVERED','PROCESSING') AND (a.exception_message_wms IS NULL OR a.exception_message_wms = '' ) AND a.order_type IN ('Normal', 'SelfPick', 'Batch', 'NewSku', 'SplitSku', 'Destroy') AND a.create_time <= #{createTime}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
